quotelist.quote: Old age is like everything else. To make a success of it, you've got to start young.Theodore Roosevelt
When grace is joined with wrinkles, it is adorable, There is an unspeakable dawn in happy old age.Victor hugo
The excitement of learning separates youth from old age. As long as you are learning you are not old- Rosalyn Yallow
My grandmother started walking five miles a day when she was sixty. She's ninety-seven now, and we don't know where the heck she is.-Ellen DeGeneres
J.R.R Tolkien was 62 when the Lord of the Ring books came out
With age comes new skills... you can laugh, cough, sneeze and pee at the same time
